Q_DESC:
Write a program to input the time in hours, mins and seconds and display it.
Create a class Time and overload the input operator >> and output operator << to take input and display.

Input:
First line contains the hours, mins and seconds separated by space
TESTCASE_1:
20 10 12
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The Time is
20 Hours 10 Mins 12 secs
TESTCASE_2:
9 12 16
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The Time is
9 Hours 12 Mins 16 secs
TESTCASE_3:
4 05 14
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The Time is
4 Hours 5 Mins 14 secs
